physical_appearance:The image depicts a the constituents of a developing tank. All the components are black in colour
 except for a red rim on the developing tank container. The lid of the container is separated from its body
 and so is its centre column. There are no visible scratches or marks on the exterior of the components of the developing tank.

sgcool_label_text:Such a tank is used to load reels of photographic film just before the development process
 which involves various steps such as the stop bath and the washing of film. This developing tank is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image depicts a the constituents of a developing tank. All the components are black in colour, except for a red rim on the developing tank container. The lid of the container is separated from its body, and so is its centre column. There are no visible scratches or marks on the exterior of the components of the developing tank.
